product.title: Up | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Disney·Pixar's Up is an amazing story about Carl Frederickson who thought life's adventures had passed him by. Spurred by the need to save the house he once shared with his beloved wife, Ellie, Carl devises an ingenious plan to fly to South America and fulfill Ellie's dream. However, things don't go as planned when Russell, a Junior Wilderness Explorer, accidently stows away. This fast-paced book will remind us all that everyday life abounds with endless adventures.

Tie-in Activity: Help your child create his own adventure book using mementos from every day adventures, such as going to grandma's house or playing in the backyard. This adventure book will become a priceless keepsake that will reignite memories years from now.
product.text:
Click on one of the tiles above to have more fun with Carl, Russell, and Dug.
